Using the Jokerman Font with @font-face

In this demonstration, we use the @font-face rule in CSS to serve the Jokerman font to the user's browser. The font file is hosted on the server, and the browser will download and display it even if the font is not installed on the clientâ€™s computer. This creates a unique and very different appearance for our page.

The CSS rule below demonstrates how the Jokerman font is applied: 

    @font-face {
        font-family: 'Jokerman';
        src: url('/itc505/lab-3/fonts/jokerman.woff2') format('woff2');
    }
